title: Fact Check: Was Rhea Chakraborty slapped during CBI interrogation? Here’s the truth | Newsmobile
author: newsmobile.in
vclaim:
As CBI has been interrogating Bollywood Actor Rhea Chakraborty in the Sushant Singh Rajput death case, several social media posts are doing the rounds, claiming that Rhea Chakroborty was allegedly slapped by a woman CBI Officer, Nupur Prasad.

The Facebook caption read, “Ek no. Madam Nupur ji Aur 4,5 chammat do isko.”

More such posts can be seen here, here, here and here.

ALSO READ: This sculpture is not from Nagvasuki Temple in Prayagraj

NewsMobile fact-checked the above post and found that the claims on social media are false.

CBI sources have confirmed to NewsMobile that during the interrogation, Bollywood actor Rhea Chakroborty was never slapped by CBI officer Nupur Prasad.

Hence, the above social media posts, with claims that Rhea Chakroborty was allegedly slapped by women CBI Officer Nupur Prasad, are FALSE.

If you want to fact-check any story, WhatsApp it now on +91 88268 00707
